description: T.1 Yew - 2m Height reduction, 1m holistic lateral reduction & shape.T.2 Yew - 1m Holistic crown reshape & balance.G.3 Laurel - Exempt.T.4 Holly - Light trim to shape.T.5 Beech - 2.5m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points & deadwood.S.6 Smoke Bush - Exempt.T.7 Oak - 2m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points & deadwood.T.8 Sycamore - Crown lift to 6m from ground level.T.9 Oak - Fell (small, young, supressed, self seeded specimen in poor form).T.10 Conifer - Crown lift to provide 1m clearance of secondary growth from structure of garage.T.11 Wisteria - Exempt.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
